meanings.definition: The state or quality of being conspicuous.
meanings.sent1: The bright colors of the flowers added to the conspicuities of the garden.
meanings.sent2: The flashing lights on the police car were a clear conspicuity on the dark road.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's attempt to hide the acorn was a failed conspicuity in the park.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, a conspicuity that lifted everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent5: The towering skyscraper was a striking conspicuity in the city skyline.

meanings.definition: Something that is conspicuous or noticeable.
meanings.sent1: The large billboard was a perfect conspicuity along the highway.
meanings.sent2: The bright red dress stood out as a conspicuity in the sea of black suits.
meanings.sent3: The oversized hat was a comical conspicuity at the formal event.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was a shining conspicuity in a world of indifference.
meanings.sent5: The rainbow after the storm was a beautiful conspicuity in the gray sky.
